name: Salomon Sight Helmet - Women's
description: Fully loaded for the safety and comfort of demanding riders. Hopefully disaster never strikes, but if it does, you’ll be prepared thanks to the safety EPS 4D foam and EPP inserts in critical impact zones. Plenty of vents and adjustable zones give you control over the temperature.Lightweight hybrid in-mould and injected shell blends safety and durability.EPS 4D foam with EPP inserts absorb and dissipate shock.Custom Dial fit adapts quickly and easily for many head shapes.Active ventilation and Thermo Control System lets you control airflow and heat venting.AdvancedSkin ActiveDry liner comes out for easy washing.Earpads are audio system compatible.Includes helmet bag.
